nodes.text: Quest for the Kyber Saber is a children's activity book based on the LEGO Star Wars television series LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures. It was published on December 26, 2016 by Scholastic Inc. and Ameet Studio.
Relive all of the humor and action of LEGO® Star Wars™ in this fun-filled activity book! Includes mazes, matching, code-breaking, puzzles, plus a buildable Death Star Trooper minifigure!
